basicInfo.name: Rakan Douli
basicInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer
basicInfo.summary: Full-Stack Developer specializing in Next.js, React, and NestJS with expertise in building production-ready marketplace platforms. Recently architected Shambay, an enterprise-grade Arabic marketplace with 40+ database entities, real-time chat, AI moderation, and 12 admin dashboards. Experienced in GraphQL APIs, TypeORM, Supabase, and cloud deployment. Known for delivering scalable solutions and exceptional attention to detail.

items.title: Full-Stack Developer
details: Architected and built Shambay (shambay.com), an enterprise-grade Arabic marketplace platform with Next.js, NestJS, and GraphQL, featuring 40+ database entities and 155+ migrations.
Developed 12 admin dashboards with real-time search, RBAC permissions, bulk operations, and comprehensive moderation tools including AI content analysis.
Implemented real-time chat system using Supabase Realtime with message status indicators, typing indicators, and unread count notifications.
Built professional advertising system with multi-package campaigns, impression tracking, automated payment flows, and priority-based ad rotation.
Implemented comprehensive RBAC permission system with role-based access control across all admin features and user-facing functionality.
Designed subscription billing system with tiered plans, transaction tracking, currency conversion, and automated email notifications.
Deployed multi-environment infrastructure with Docker on Hetzner (backend) and Vercel (frontends), with separate staging and production databases on Supabase.

items.title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
details: Co-developed a full-stack voting platform using Vue.js and NestJS, integrated with Supabase Auth and PostgreSQL.
Built a full-stack NFT generator (React + Flask) with GIF/image processing and Firebase Auth integration.
Developed custom WordPress themes with LESS and JavaScript for responsive client websites.
Improved website performance through image compression, lazy loading, and script optimization.
Enhanced SEO visibility through on-page optimization, structured data, and performance tuning.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed and maintained internal management applications using Vue.js and Laravel in a headless setup to ensure flexibility and decoupled architecture.
Implemented new features and resolved bugs for internal tools, enhancing user experience and improving internal processes.
Enhanced the functionality of the shop app, optimizing it for better user experience through API-driven updates and decoupled front and backend components.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed new features and fixed bugs for multiple web applications in a headless environment, using React, Node.js, and GraphQL for API-driven content management.
Implemented load tests on the database gateway with JavaScript to optimize performance, resulting in faster data retrieval and resource efficiency.
Focused on improving the decoupled data flow, reducing load times by 30% and enhancing the scalability of front-end components.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Built and styled API-driven, reusable components in a headless architecture using React/Next.js, enhancing scalability and flexibility.
Managed content integration using Contentful CMS and GraphQL for clients like Cookware-Co, Spelt, and Van Nes + Plaisier, optimizing frontend data delivery and performance.
Conducted A/B testing for Etos, Burger King (BK), and Cookware-Co using Google Optimize and Sitespect, achieving significant engagement and conversion improvements.
Designed HTML email templates for Vodafone Netherlands with Mandrillapp, boosting customer engagement and communication effectiveness.

items.title: Sales Prompter
details: Provided exceptional customer service and utilized persuasive communication skills to drive sales and promote products.

items.title: Graphic Designer & Translator
details: Designed visual materials such as posters, flyers, and brochures.
Created an Arabic-language Facebook page, managing translations and content for increased engagement.

items.title: Logistics Employee
details: Oversaw logistics and managed exports to Iraq, ensuring efficient and timely deliveries.

items.title: Account Manager
details: Managed over 50 customer accounts, addressing payment and invoicing issues and maintaining positive client relations.
Used Sage accounting software to streamline inventory management, boosting team productivity by 50%.
Created monthly sales reports for regional offices, improving insights into sales performance.

items.title: Sales Promoter
details: Managed the Toshiba television section, providing product expertise to increase sales.
Recognized as the Best TV Sales Promoter for outstanding sales performance.

items.title: Cloud & Data Management Training Program – ITMG / ESF
